price: Then We made you their successors in the land to see how you would behave[18].
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ خَلَٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ لِنَنظُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: [18] The Messenger (ﷺ) said: “Life is alluringly lush green. Allah will make you successors in it to see what you do” [Muslim: 2742].

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnākum khalāifa fī al-arḍi min baʿdihim linanẓura kayfa taʿmalūna
